description:
Peak game
Remember to actually edit this later

release.description: First release I would consider to be fully complete
release.title: Release V1.0.0

release1.2.description:
Changes:

NiGHTS powerups are now unlockable items
sound test as filler (technically)
added "music" to multiworld zone to get rid of the error message

colored console in singleplayer
chat can now print multiple messages at once

level clear emblems are now part of the levels theyre assigned to instead of extra emblems (you can view if youve cleared a level from its pause menu)

replay tutorial trap is fixed in multiplayer
fixed logic issues that required the chaos emeralds
egg rock 2 heart emblem logic fix
fixed the good ending not working
reduced max emblems to 250 due to fun integer stuff
release1.2.title: Release V1.2.0

release1.2.1.description:
Minor bugfix version:
fixed generating a game with bcz emblems set to 0
the requirements for thz2 emerald token under slime are only the elemental shield on easy difficuly
fixed checks sending when not clearing apgamedat.dat upon switching seeds
every zone now appears in the statistics menu when reloading the client
deathlink should now work properly

If youre using 1.2.0 you don't have to download the pk3, because it is the same
release1.2.1.title: V1.2.1

release1.3.description:
- added multiplayer match maps as toggleable locations/items
- self propelled bomb trap
- grow/shrink traps
- double rings filler
- fixed knuckles
- fixed deathlink again
- replay tutorial in multiplayer should no longer crash immediately
- fixed timed traps wearing off too soon in multiplayer
- fixed shields being able to be collected when not unlocked with a fire flower
- removed the dependency on "L_AddBot-v1.2.lua"
- fixed more logic bugs
- wip showcoords console command
release1.3.title: V1.3.0

release1.3.1.description:
Fixed APTranslator.dat not being created when launching the client for the first time

same pk3 as the last release, just a new apworld
release1.3.1.title: V1.3.1

release2.description: Added monitorsanity for 1UPs along with other new options
release2.title: Release V1.1.0

release2.1.description:
Fixed generation issues when monitorsanity/ emblems are turned off
PK3 now follows the SRB2MB naming format
release2.1.title: Release V1.1.1

release2.2.description:
I forgot I named the other one V1.1.1 so consider this V1.1.1b
Bugfixing update #1.5
Multiplayer
map emblems can now be collected by players other than the host
hud will now show required emblems for players other than the host
chat now mirrors the client in multiplayer
added multiple player spawns for multiworld zone
replay tutorial no loger crashes everyone except the host

Singleplayer
console mirrors client in singleplayer
fixed the client not autoloading the new pk3
fixed singleplayer special stages replaying on finishing
type "hub" into the console to return to the hub in singleplayer


Known Issues
replay tutorial is currently a placeholder in multiplayer
some filler/traps only affect host
in game chat isnt colored based on item recieved
release2.2.title: Actual Release V1.1.1

v1.3.2.description:
- fixed the pipe towers entrance
- & knuckles will no longer send a deathlink
- double rings is no longer classified as a trap
- tutorial can now be completed by fang and amy

new pk3 so you will have to update that
v1.3.2.title: V1.3.2

v1.3.3.description:
I am very good at coding and did not forget an '=' in the lua script

Also for future note, I can't release this on the SRB2MB at the moment because its under review so someone pester me when the old version gets rejected in like a week for not loading.
v1.3.3.title: v1.3.3

v1.3.4.description:
fixed utf-8 characters crashing the client
match zones can now be entered in multiplayer
v1.3.4.title: V1.3.4

v1.3.6.description:
fixed the apworld not generating
fixed monitors not sending checks
v1.3.6.title: v1.3.6

v1.4.0.description:
- Monitorsanity for ring monitors

- logic is in place for different starting characters (not implemented yet)
- pipe towers monitors now work
- some monitor locations have been named for feedback purposes
- trap percentage option in yaml
- item/location groups exist for zones, tokens, monitors, shields etc
- client now inherits the common client, fixing most client crashing issues
- stages are now unlocked in record attack/statistics based on received zones
- every trap youve received no longer activates when reloading the client
- traps and filler are now weighted based on how annoying/helpful they are

- spb nerfed to need to accelerate to top speed
- nerfed slippery floors to 75 seconds instead of 90
- minimum number of emblems reduced to 10
v1.4.0.title: v1.4.0

v1.4.2.description:
- more stable multiplayer
- generation on easy fixed
- removed the code for pre-breaking monitors until i actually fix it
- goaling is probably fixed
- $showcoords is now fully implemented
- sonic isnt an item in the multiword anymore
v1.4.2.title: v1.4.2

v1.4.3.description:
- fixed filler/traps not being sent when items were previously collected
- fixed deathlink activating and continuosly killing you
- the correct folders are now created the first time you launch the client
- the client no longer sends messages twice when breaking two monitors at once
v1.4.3.title: v1.4.3

v1.4.4.description:
- starting character option has been added
- unlocked characters are now enforced in multiplayer and record attack
- added act markers on the ground in the hub
- shield monitors are now pre-broken until unlocked
- fixed Deep Sea (Act 1) Monitor - x:10304 y:-736
- added logic to match maps' ring monitors that were missing before
v1.4.4.title: v1.4.4

v1.4.5.description: fixed the ptz entrance and black hole + dream hill opening at the same time again
v1.4.5.title: V1.4.5

v1.5.0.description:
- ring link with 3 difficulties

- fixed Techno Hill (Act 2) Monitor - x:-2048 y:-7872
- jumpscare trap with customizable images via a seperate pk3
- fixed dying in final demo zone preventing monitors from sending locations
- fixed an internal item location mismatch
- fixed some logic errors involving fang
- fixed the tab emblem counter for like the 5th time
- added the only bcz2 1up monitor to 1upsanity
- more progress on naming every monitor location
- fixed good ending goal triggering on bad ending
v1.5.0.title: v1.5.0

v1.5.1.description:
- fixed ring link crashing when getting rid of more rings than you have
- fixed death link disconnecting maybe 
- ring and death link now work in multiplayer (other players in a server will share rings/death)
v1.5.1.title: v1.5.1

v1.5.2.description:
fixed knuckles breaking reality when ringlink is turned on
fixed sonic forces clipping you through walls on rope pulleys

fixed bad internet resending all your traps
fixed generation issue
v1.5.2.title: v1.5.2b

v1.5.2c.description:
- Various stability improvements to ringlink
- all 1up monitors have been named
- filler and trap weights
- ability to toggle nights stages as locations/items
- forced gravity boots is back in the item pool

expect 1.5.2d when i get around to updating this for launcher version 0.6.4
v1.5.2c.title: v1.5.2c

v1.6.0.description:
- added actsanity
- added object locking (currently doesnt support either monitorsanity)
- added the ap 0.7 manifest file
- decorated the hub to be more fun while youre BK
- fixed various misnamed monitors
- laid groundwork for custom character support

please use universal tracker to report any logic bugs
v1.6.0.title: v1.6.0
